title: Authorizes commissioner of agriculture and markets to render an opinion to government officials on land use regulations pertaining to agricultural practices
summary: Upon the request of a municipality, farm owner or operator the commissioner of agriculture and markets shall render an opinion to local government officials as to whether farm operations would be unreasonably restricted or regulated by proposed changes in local land use regulations, ordinances, or local laws pertaining to agricultural practices; further requires the commissioner to disclose information received from Cornell and the USDA to the municipality in which the agricultural practice is being evaluated is located.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to authorizing requests to the commissioner of agriculture and markets to render an opinion to government officials on local land use regulations, ordinances or local laws pertaining to agricultural practices
